transport.question: I have wheels and take you to school. I am big and yellow. What am I?

hints.text: 🟡 My main color is the color of the sun.
🧒 Many children ride me to school.
🛑 I stop to pick up children at the side of the road.

transport.question: I float on the water and carry people or things across the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I travel on water.
🚢 I am bigger than a rowboat.
⚓ I have a captain!

transport.question: I have two wheels and you pedal to move me. What am I?

hints.text: 🚶 You need to use your legs to make me move.
⚙️ I have pedals.
🚲 I am a fun way to exercise!

transport.question: I travel on tracks and can carry many people. Choo choo!

hints.text: 🚝 I travel on metal tracks.
📣 I make a loud 'choo choo' sound.
🧑‍🤝‍🧑 Many people can travel on me at the same time.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and have wings. I can take you to far away places. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am often seen high in the sky.
✈️ I have big wings.
🌍 I can take you to different countries.

transport.question: I am big and carry lots of goods on the road. Sometimes I carry things to the shop. What am I?

hints.text: 📦 I carry large items, often in boxes.
🚚 I am bigger than a car.
🚦You can see me on highways.

transport.question: I can fly straight up and down, and have a spinning blade on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I make a 'whop whop' sound.
⬆️ I can land on the top of a building.
👮 Police and rescue services sometimes use me.

transport.question: I’m like a house on wheels, and people can live in me while traveling. What am I?

hints.text: 🏡 I have a kitchen and a bed inside.
🏕️ People use me when they go camping.
🛣️ I travel on roads but people live inside.

transport.question: I'm a fast way to travel under the city. I stop at stations. What am I?

hints.text: 🚇 I travel underground.
🗺️ You can use a map to find out where I go.
🚦I help avoid traffic jams.

transport.question: I take you into space. I am tall and powerful. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I am very fast!
🧑‍🚀 Astronauts travel on me.
✨ I explore the stars.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I love to eat peanuts. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐘 I'm a very large animal.
🥜 I have a grey wrinkly skin.
💦 I can use my nose as a shower!

animal.question: I say 'Meow' and love to chase mice. I like to drink milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🐈‍⬛ I have soft fur.
🧶 I love to play with yarn.
🐟 I purr when you pet me and I eat fishes.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. I love to play fetch. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew bones.
🎾 I'm a very loyal friend.
🏠 I guard your house.

animal.question: I quack and waddle. I like to swim in the pond. What am I?

hints.text: 🦢 I'm a bird.
🧡 I have webbed feet.
🌾 I eat underwater plants.

animal.question: I say 'Moo' and give you milk. I eat grass in the field. What am I?

hints.text: 🖤 I'm often black and white.
🔔 I wear a bell around my neck in the mountains.
🐄 My babies are called calves.

animal.question: I roar and I am the king of the jungle. I have a big mane around my face. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I'm a very strong cat.
👑 I sleep for a long time during the day.
🥩 I eat meat and live in Africa.

animal.question: I hop and have long ears. I love to eat carrots. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I have a fluffy tail.
🌱 I like to eat vegetables.
🏡 People can keep me as a pet.

animal.question: I chirp and fly. I build nests in trees. Who am I?

hints.text: 🪶 I lay eggs in my nest.
🐛 I eat seeds and worms.
🐦 Some of us migrate when it get cold.

animal.question: I slither and have no legs. Some of us are poisonous. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I shed my skin.
🥚 I lay eggs or give birth to live young.
🐁 I can be found in many colors and some eat mice.

animal.question: I live in the sea and have eight arms. I can change color to hide. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I don't have any bones.
💙 I squirt ink when I'm scared.
🐚 I can squeeze into tight places.
